mean_cn: n. 舒适，安慰；  v. 安慰，使舒适
mean_en: a state or situation in which you are relaxed and do not have any physically unpleasant feelings caused by pain, heat, cold, etc.
short_phrase: enjoys the comfort of his office
sentence: The woman tries to comfort her crying daughter.
sentence_trans: 那个女人在安慰正在哭泣的女儿。
